meanings.definition: To unscramble or decode (a message or signal)
meanings.sent1: She descrambles the secret code to reveal the hidden message.
meanings.sent2: He descrambles the jumbled letters to form a coherent sentence.
meanings.sent3: The detective descrambles the cryptic note to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in puzzles descrambles even the most complex codes effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The software quickly descrambles the encrypted data for easy access.

meanings.definition: The act of descrambling a message or signal
meanings.sent1: The descrambles of the encrypted file was successful.
meanings.sent2: His descrambles of the radio transmission helped decipher the distress call.
meanings.sent3: The descrambles of the TV signal made the show watchable again.
meanings.sent4: The descrambles of the coded message revealed a hidden treasure map.
meanings.sent5: Her quick descrambles of the Morse code saved the day.
